version_description: Fixed an issue that made our Chat module crash
We've made some fixes regarding the usage of location when posting and searching for products.
Fixed an issue that made our Chat module crash
We've made some fixes regarding the usage of location when posting and searching for products.

What`s new:

- Removed load on phone’s processor by re-using UI components when scrolling down on listing pages
- Avoided loading images that are not shown on the item page
- Reduced memory usage consumption by optimizing caching strategy

What`s new:

- Removed load on phone’s processor by re-using UI components when scrolling down on listing pages
- Avoided loading images that are not shown on the item page
- Reduced memory usage consumption by optimizing caching strategy

What's new:

- Now you can filter your ads by active and inactive.

What's new:

- Now you can filter your ads by active and inactive.
Improvements in Ad Details Screen and in My Ads section
Improvements in Ad Details Screen and in My Ads section
We are using January to polish the app to the highest level. We fixed minor bugs.

What's new:

Bug fixes and performance improvement.
We're regularly making changes and improvements. To make sure you don't miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.

What's new:

Bug fixes and performance improvement.
We're regularly making changes and improvements. To make sure you don't miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.

What's new?
- Improved startup time of the app.
- Fixed crashes in chat module.

What's new?
- Improved startup time of the app.
- Fixed crashes in chat module.

What's new?
- Optimized image size for faster download.
Fixed bug
- in My Profile. Published ads should not be shown.
- in Real Estate. Lead form doesn't appear when project page is opened through deeplink.
- in Chat window. UserIcon gets overlapped with back text while landing on chat-window from search.
- in Item page. Seller can't see AdID in Ad Details.

What's new?
- Optimized image size for faster download.
Fixed bug
- in My Profile. Published ads should not be shown.
- in Real Estate. Lead form doesn't appear when project page is opened through deeplink.
- in Chat window. UserIcon gets overlapped with back text while landing on chat-window from search.
- in Item page. Seller can't see AdID in Ad Details.

What's New:
- Bug fixing where we display the search results.

What's New:
- Bug fixing where we display the search results.

What's New:
- We’ve fixed some issues related to filters and data in the listings.

What's New:
- We’ve fixed some issues related to filters and data in the listings.
We’ve been working to help users understand where ads are located at: Whenever a location or distance is changed, messages are now bolder, bigger and more descriptive.
We’ve been working to help users understand where ads are located at: Whenever a location or distance is changed, messages are now bolder, bigger and more descriptive.
We redesigned the ad card so that missing information can now be displayed. Additionally we improved how texts are structured.
We redesigned the ad card so that missing information can now be displayed. Additionally we improved how texts are structured.

What's new:
- Fixed an issue when chats were loaded.

What's new:
- Fixed an issue when chats were loaded.

What's new:
Now, before you delete your ad, we're going to ask you if it was sold, and to whom.
Our sponsored Real Estate Projects are now labeled.
We also improved the speed without needing to adjust quality with quick and easy transition between pages with customised loading.
And last but not least, now you can make the best out of your profile with new Profile Completion feature.

What's new:
Now, before you delete your ad, we're going to ask you if it was sold, and to whom.
Our sponsored Real Estate Projects are now labeled.
We also improved the speed without needing to adjust quality with quick and easy transition between pages with customised loading.
And last but not least, now you can make the best out of your profile with new Profile Completion feature.

We made some performance improvements. Now you can see more images with the same amount of cellular data.

OLX Ghana has become Jiji.gh officially!

We are excited to announce that you may still use your existing account without having to create a new one on Jiji.

From now OLX is no longer supported.

Now you can set payment period when you add property for rent.
Phone number confirmation has become much easier now.
Also we’ve updated details about all Premium Packages. Hurry up to find out what features they offer!

Now you can set payment period when you add property for rent.
Phone number confirmation has become much easier now.
Also we’ve updated details about all Premium Packages. Hurry up to find out what features they offer!

Mad oh! Finally, you no longer have to guess what the reason for decline was ;) You’ll see it right there while editing!

Say bye-bye to 403 error! Well, even if something goes wrong, we won’t leave you alone ;)

Mad oh! Finally, you no longer have to guess what the reason for decline was ;) You’ll see it right there while editing!

Say bye-bye to 403 error! Well, even if something goes wrong, we won’t leave you alone ;)

- Somebody's feedback impressed you? Show your reaction! Now you can comment and like any review!

- No more disappointments! Now after clicking on an ad to install the Jiji app, you’ll still see the product you clicked on in the ad after installation

- If you had unexplainable issues with posting ads in Computer Monitors category, you should know that we’ve fixed this bug!

- And yes, no issues with logging in via Facebook anymore! We worked it out!

- A bit more convenience for sellers! As from today you can top up your in-app balance and make use of Premium Services even easier

- Important bug fixed: no more issues with sending report about abuse, but we hope you won’t need this button...

- And we did many other small corrections so you don’t face issues while posting ads or searching for products

- Somebody's feedback impressed you? Show your reaction! Now you can comment and like any review!

- No more disappointments! Now after clicking on an ad to install the Jiji app, you’ll still see the product you clicked on in the ad after installation

- If you had unexplainable issues with posting ads in Computer Monitors category, you should know that we’ve fixed this bug!

- And yes, no issues with logging in via Facebook anymore! We worked it out!

- A bit more convenience for sellers! As from today you can top up your in-app balance and make use of Premium Services even easier

- Important bug fixed: no more issues with sending report about abuse, but we hope you won’t need this button...

- And we did many other small corrections so you don’t face issues while posting ads or searching for products

Welcome our new design for the posting ad page! It remembers your most frequently used categories for ads. Pretty convenient, right?

Filters make our life easier! And from now, you'll see the most popular filters every time you're searching for something.

Cashback is here! We've added a reminder on the Premium Services page so you never forget about the additional benefits we offer.

There is no app without bugs...but we've fixed a lot in ours, so you feel more comfortable when chatting and checking feedback.

Welcome our new design for the posting ad page! It remembers your most frequently used categories for ads. Pretty convenient, right?

Filters make our life easier! And from now, you'll see the most popular filters every time you're searching for something.

Cashback is here! We've added a reminder on the Premium Services page so you never forget about the additional benefits we offer.

There is no app without bugs...but we've fixed a lot in ours, so you feel more comfortable when chatting and checking feedback.

1. Some of you couldn’t see a balance and a list of premium subscriptions. Finally, we can forget about this bug!
2. We don’t want any of you to delete your accounts but in case you decide that, you’ll be able to confirm your deletion either on email or on phone.
3. Sometimes all we need is to archive some chats just in one click. As from today, nothing goes wrong with that.
4. For your convenience, now we’re showing a picture and price of the item you’re chatting about.
5. And, of course, we’ve fixed a bug with loading chats - you’ll see them all, no matter how many of them you have!

1. Some of you couldn’t see a balance and a list of premium subscriptions. Finally, we can forget about this bug!
2. We don’t want any of you to delete your accounts but in case you decide that, you’ll be able to confirm your deletion either on email or on phone.
3. Sometimes all we need is to archive some chats just in one click. As from today, nothing goes wrong with that.
4. For your convenience, now we’re showing a picture and price of the item you’re chatting about.
5. And, of course, we’ve fixed a bug with loading chats - you’ll see them all, no matter how many of them you have!
